short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyword cpc and search volume to Many diffrent services including SERPs, UberSuggest, Majestic SEO, OSE and WMT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension combines all the functionality of the 6 pervious chrome extensions so they don't fill up your tools list

It enhances the SERPs of Google and Bing with CPC data for the query

I adds CPC and search volume data into ubersuggest and in your search data in Google Webmaster Tools

Also it enhances the reports on anchor text in the 3 big link data providers Moz's Open Site Explorer, Majestic SEO's Site Explorer and aHerf's Explorer

Don't forget to add your API key in the options or it wont work

Get an API key from:
http://grepwords.com
